content: I like those ideas, especially the quinoa salad with grilled chicken and avocado. I've been trying to reduce food waste by planning my meals around what's near expiration in the pantry, so I'll have to check what ingredients I already have at home. Also, I've been experimenting with meal prep, making a big batch of quinoa and roasted vegetables on Sundays to use throughout the week, so I can definitely incorporate some of these recipes into my routine. Speaking of meal prep, do you have any suggestions for healthy snacks that are easy to prepare and can be taken on-the-go?
